tit.cmt: 単語調査では地方官会議はLocal Administrative Assembliesなので編集しました。

sen.j: 地方官会議（ちほうかんかいぎ）とは、1874年（明治7年）に設置された、明治政府が招集した府県長官の会議のことである。
sen.e: Local Administrative Meeting was the meeting started by the Meiji government in 1874 between administrators of prefectures.
Local Administrative Assemblies was the assembly of prefectural governors summoned and established by the Meiji government in 1874.
sen.cmt: 単語調査では府県長官はprefectural governorsなので編集しました。
sen.e: Local Administrative Assemblies was the assembly of prefectural governors summoned and established by the Meiji government in 1874.

sen.j: 大阪会議で木戸孝允が構想し、開設が決定した。
sen.e: The original idea was presented by Takayoshi KIDO in Osaka conference, and set into action.
It was inspired by Takayoshi KIDO in Osaka assembly and established.
sen.cmt: 少し滑らかにしました。
sen.e: It was inspired by Takayoshi KIDO in Osaka assembly and established.

sen.j: 1875年（明治8年）以来3回、地方民情を知るために、県令および府知事を招集した。
sen.e: From 1875, to gather information on the states of people living in local areas, the administrators were called on three times in total.
Prefectural governors gathered three times since 1875 to learn of the living conditions of people in district areas.
sen.cmt: 少し滑らかにしました。
sen.e: Prefectural governors gathered three times since 1875 to learn of the living conditions of people in district areas.

sen.j: 地方民会や三新法など地方自治に関係のある、地方行政を巡る諸問題を審議した。
sen.e: They discussed about various matters regarding local administration such as local assembly and Chihou San Shinpou.
They discussed about various matters of district administration related to the local assembly and three local new laws.
sen.cmt: 単語調査では三新法は three local new lawsでしたので編集しました。
sen.e: They discussed about various matters of district administration related to the local assembly and three local new laws.

sen.j: なお、元老院 (日本)に対する下院のつもりであるが、実質は官選の事務官会議であった。
sen.e: While it was supposed to serve as The Lower House toward the Senate (in this case, the Japanese government), it was virtually the meeting between nonelective officials.
It was the lower house of the Genroin (Japanese Senate) was actually the assembly of administrative official appointed by government.
sen.cmt: 少し滑らかにしました。
sen.e: It was the lower house of the Genroin (Japanese Senate) was actually the assembly of administrative official appointed by government.

sen.j: その後、1881年（明治14年）、国会開設の勅諭によって廃止となった。
sen.e: It was abolished in 1881, the launch of the National Diet was announced.
It was abolished in 1881 due to the imperial mandate for establishing a Diet.
sen.cmt: 勅諭はannouncedではなく、imperial mandateなので編集しました。
sen.e: It was abolished in 1881 due to the imperial mandate for establishing a Diet.
